name: transfer-ui
description: Transfer files easily with the help of command line and https://transfer.sh/ service

scripts.build: npm run make-directories && browserify app/index.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ babelify ] --node
scripts.build:watch: npm run make-directories && watchify app/index.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ babelify ] --node --debug --verbose
scripts.start: npm run build && electron . | npm run build:watch

author: rogerkerse@gmail.com
